title: 6.The Bravery of Laxmi Bai
description: The inspiring story of Rani Laxmi Bai, the Queen of Jhansi, who fought for her kingdom during the Indian Rebellion of 1857.

content.text: Laxmi Bai was born into a noble family and was trained in martial arts, preparing to defend her kingdom from any threat.
During the rebellion of 1857, Laxmi Bai took command of the forces of Jhansi and fought against the British with unwavering courage.
